mapper.select: SELECT l.d_name, l.d_repay, l.account, l.d_rate, l.d_amount, l.d_start_date, l.d_end_date, l.d_balance, l.d_month, l.d_loan_balance, l.d_loan_rate, l.d_ERR, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, l.d_start_date)+1) as d_next_rate, l.d_auto_account FROM account_info i, loans l WHERE i.account = l.account AND i.id=#{id} AND l.d_state=1 ORDER BY l.account
